ingredients: 1   +   3/4 cups fresh figs, 3  eggs,   +   1/2 cup applesauce,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup brown sugar, 1 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/4 cup flax seed meal, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1   +   1/4 cups old-fashioned oats
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 2%, Cholesterol 23mg 8%, Sodium 80mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 17g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 0mg 2%, Calcium 23mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 65mg 1%
